column1: 423176312354635779;"gcharang#6833";"02-Nov-18 01:26 AM";"Once the chain is greater than approx 120 blocks
column2: you can add other nodes to the network using the same parameters as the first two nodes. the `-seednode` can be any of the first two nodes
column3: it just needs to continously be online";"";"";

column1: 455741312273219595;"jl777c#5810";"02-Nov-18 11:03 AM";"different ac parameters refer to a different chain";"";"";
